clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Intended for the treatment of solid tumors and lymphomas

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: GMX1777 exhibits unusually potent anti tumor activity in preclinical animal models The novel mechanism of action of GMX1778 supports the clinical use of GMX1777 as an anti cancer agent Moreover the strong dependency of cancer cells on NAD to support DNA repair suggests a strong rationale for the use of GMX1777 in combination with DNA damaging agents for future trials
